title: Fit & Well_ Core Concepts and Labs in Phys - Fahey.pdf
description:
Fit & Well: Core Concepts and Labs in Physical Fitness and Wellness, 11th Edition
Format: PDF | Fully Indexed and Searchable
Pages: 512 | Print Replica

Author: Paul M Insel, Thomas D. Fahey, Walton T. Roth
Publisher: McGraw-Hill Education; (January 13, 2014)
Language: English
ISBN-10: 007352347X
ISBN-13: 978-0073523477

Book Description: Fit & Well gives students the knowledge and skills they need to make meaningful and lasting behavior change. The new edition combines proven science-based content and digital teaching and learning tools with the exciting introduction of liveWell - an innovative online, multi-media program designed to help college students improve their exercise, eating, and stress management habits.

Table of Contents:

8 NUTRITION 227
